personal.title: Mechanical-Ops Systems Strategist
personal.summary:
Hybrid mechanical-business strategist with dual fluency in hard engineering workflows and full-stack business operations. Bachelor of Management (UBCO) + in-progress Mechanical Engineering Technology diploma (SAIT) — a pairing that lets me move seamlessly from CAD benches and RPAS field ops to P&L dashboards and ERP roll-outs. Known for compressing time-to-outcome: 70%+ invoice-automation cuts, 30%+ logistics-error drops, 75% labor-hour reductions. Adept at translating messy, multi-actor systems into lean pipelines through Python, SolidWorks, SAP, Bubble.io, or simply disciplined SOP design. Seeking roles where systems thinking, data rigor, and hands-on execution converge — whether in product ops, technical project management, or operations engineering.

Core Value Props
• Process & workflow redesign • Cross-functional leadership • Data-driven decision-making
• CAD-to-Cash pipeline insight • Technical-financial bilingualism • Rapid automation & prototyping. Holder of Alberta Class 5 driver's licence with reliable transportation for project-site visits.
